thread.section_title: BookIt.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BookIt.com | bookit.com | 4 of 697
thread.title: Fernando Torres

author: Fernando Torres
title: Fernando Torres
text: hit a bit of snag when it came to checking out with the flights i had pre-selected, turned out those flight options were not available. however, excellent customer service as they contacted me when the error appeared and helped me resolve the issue by finding another flight. not the ideal flights we wanted but the rest of the trip was a solid book. will use again for sure.
